title: China attacks foreign clothing, shoe brands over Xinjiang
content:
1. China attacks foreign clothing, shoe brands over Xinjiang  The Associated Press
  2. Nike faces social media storm in China over Xinjiang statement  Fox Business
  3. Chinese Weibo users burn Nikes after brand critiques Uyghur conditions  Insider
  4. Chinese public voices support for Xinjiang cotton, turns to domestic brands over H&M, Nike- Global Times  The Edge Markets MY
  5. Nike, H&M face China fury over Xinjiang cotton 'concerns'  BBC News
